comment: Do you know by change if qsurrounding and qsystem are proportional? I have been seeing qsys= -qsurrounding. I was wondering if it's the same as saying -qsys = -qsurrounding.   I was doing a problem asking to solve for the enthalpy change of the system given information of everything about the solution. I solved it and got a positive answer but switched it to negative since I was assuming they were proportional.
Great video on the topic!
